name: Rgb-steampunk
tagline: RGB-Steampunk is a 2.5D (2D movement set in a 3D generated world) brawler in which you fight enemies with melee attacks, a steam powered grappling claw, and a magic powered word shifting system which gives you multiple approaches to encounters.
body:
# RGB-Steampunk
RGB-Steampunk is a 2.5D (2D movement set in a 3D generated world) brawler in which you fight enemies with melee attacks, a steam powered grappling claw, and a magic powered word shifting system which gives you multiple approaches to encounters.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
